Package src.items

Class Item

java.lang.Object
src.items.Item
public class Item extends Object
The Item class represents an item in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String itemType, String name, int boost, String boostType, int price, Boolean isCoach)
      Constructs an Item object.
      Parameters:
      itemType - the type of the item
      name - the name of the item
      boost - the boost value of the item
      boostType - the type of boost provided by the item
      price - the price of the item
      isCoach - indicates if the item is a coach item
